sentence.Network_en: Losses suffered by the mortgagee as a result thereof shall be compensated by the mortgagor.
sentence.Network_cn: 承押人因此所受的损失由抵押人赔偿.

sentence.Network_en: The payment has to countersigned by the mortgagor.
sentence.Network_cn: 该付款必须有抵押人的会签.

sentence.Network_en: In practice the mortgagor will usually remain in possession of the property.
sentence.Network_cn: 实践中抵押人通常仍保留着对财产的占有.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...个取消了赎回权的抵押权人（mortgagee）并不因此而变成财产所有人，如果财产在抵押期满后的拍卖中被出售，那么抵押人（mortgagor）就有权取得出售价中高于（如果有的话）抵押价的那部分数额。.
国贸名词 ... mortgagee 受押者；贷款人 mortgagor 抵押者；借款人 multi-national company 跨国公司.
mortgagee 受押者；贷款人mortgagor 抵押者；借款人motion study 动作研究
...“按揭”(mortgage) 指作为金钱或金钱等值的偿还保证的土地抵押；“按揭人”(mortgagor) 包括藉按揭人提出申索的人；“按揭金”(mortgage money) 指藉一项按揭作为偿还保证的金钱或金钱的等值；.

list.abs: The mortgagor retains legal title to the land ., 抵押人保留着对土地的法律上的所有权.
original mortgagee 原承按人original mortgagor 原按揭人original receipt 收据正本；收条正本
the name and address of each mortgagor ;, 每名抵押人的姓名地址;
collateral relations , if the debtor or mortgagor , only two main legal relationship that Mortgages and mortgage .抵押关系中，若债务人即抵押人，则只有两个法律关系主体即抵押权人和抵押人。

means.word_mean: 1. the person who gives a mortgage in return for money to be repaid;

sentences.sentence: "we became mortgagors when the bank accepted our mortgage and loaned us the money to buy our new home"
